biography: Pastor Mbewe has been serving in the ministry for over 20 years. He is passionate about spreading the gospel and has a deep commitment to the community. He is currently serving as the Senior Pastor at Nkhoma CCAP. His academic qualifications include a Doctorate in Theology and a Master's degree in Divinity.
title: Senior Pastor

biography: Pastor Banda is known for his deep spiritual insights and his commitment to mentoring young leaders in the church. He has been part of the pastoral team at Chilanga CCAP for over 10 years. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Theology and is currently pursuing a Master's degree in Christian Counseling.
title: Associate Pastor

biography: Pastor Mitomoni is preparing for ordination and is awaiting assignment to a church. He holds a Master's degree in Divinity and is passionate about youth ministry.
title: Pastor in Training

biography: Pastor Emmanuel Mbewe is awaiting his first placement in the ministry. He has completed his theological training and is looking forward to serving a local congregation.
title: Pastor in Training
